locations.title: Truck Towne Travel Plaza
locations.content: Truck Towne Travel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: After a trying day I was glad to see a nice CLEAN shower @ $10 bucks matter of face I left a tip & note for who ever is taking care of the showers & I'm a tight wod with my money! Staff was pleasant & helpful. ‚Ä¶
Great off the road truck stop. If you fill up 100 gallons you get a free shower. Gravel lot plenty of room
Great food , awesome service. Hubby was able to wash his clothes while we ate breakfast.  Showers available too , just don't move the shower head.
Clean shower, and the best hamburger steak I have had in years!
Clean shower and was only $8 without fuel

locations.showerReviewSummary: 5 shower-related reviews found. Generally Positive mentions of: shower, showers, clean, wash
locations.hours: Ó¢µOpen 24 hours ÓóèWednesdayOpen 24 hoursÓÖçThursdayOpen 24 hoursÓÖçFridayOpen 24 hoursÓÖçSaturdayOpen 24 hoursÓÖçSundayOpen 24 hoursÓÖçMondayOpen 24 hoursÓÖçTuesdayOpen 24 hoursÓÖçSuggest new hours

locations.title: Circle K | Truck Stop
locations.content: Hilltop Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Friendly people inside and shower was ok. Big lot for parking. Was here on a Sunday and told they were not cooking any burgers or anything else and told about their cold options instead
Nice place, many spots at night for trucks. Big cafe 24h. Shower 8.52$. Clean, friendly, I recommend

So the Circle K part of this truckstop needs to learn customer service. I'm a truck driver and I decided to shower here. They gave me a key for the shower. I went and put my stuff now and realized there weren't towels. I walked out without ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ restaurant, good food,  friendly staff. Not a fan of the having to prepay inside for fuel, and their showers are ok and clean, but, they have no where to store your soap and stuff while in the shower. The actual shower space is also pretty ‚Ä¶

Damn place had no hot water for showers. And had the nerve to charge me 12 bucks for stupid cold shower don't understand why truck drivers always get the short end of the stick. I think it's more like they didn't want to clean the shower ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ station part is nice.  A woman staff member was right there when I pushed my husband, that's in a wheelchair, into the store and she asked  if I needed to use one of the shower rooms to get my husband to a toilet.  I was so surprised and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ but it smelled great and was busy,  had locals coming to it, so it must be Good! Got my shower free as a " thank you for your patience" while the diesel pumps are being replaced.  Nice big hot, clean showers....small towels, but So am I... ‚Ä¶

Good food, but after spending alot of money on fuel. I was told I get a shower. But each time I stop in I'm told no showers are available an they don't have time to clean them. But the place is empty. Don't think I'll stop here again.  I'm ‚Ä¶
Great Service & Breakfast & Dinner at Marlin s. The Big Beefy Burger is Great. Waitress are Great as We'll.  Customer Service. Shower are Better then Loves.( Bigger Rooms ) Thanks
Today I fuel truck on 100 gallons in ‚ÄúI-90, Exit 96 Missoula, MT‚Äù and they gave me 1 shower and drink again, I asked for help the cashier but he don‚Äôt help me. Awful service
It was also close to the motels and info about all Mitchell has to offer, I rested in a comfortable area that allowed me to shower once when only passing through.

Don't come here to get a fountain pop for the road. Worst quality cups for fountain pop I have ever experienced. The lids just rest on top/don't close. Loved spending 15 minutes on the side of the road cleaning up my car from the spill. Get different cups, please.

Friendly staff, clean restrooms, showers and quick check out. They also have an ATM, laundry room and mini Casino inside. Lots of truck parking and a 24-hour restaurant connected to you the Travel Center. There are tables and seating inside the casino and a counter section that you can sit at as well.
Great place for gas way cheaper than Washington clean and well kept. If you're missing something on your trip they should have what you need including power cords and batteries

Stopped in due to severe storm. Had a bit to eat in the Restaurant, Marlin's. Decent menu and food! Gals were all helpful and polite! Fuel and Gas islands, showers, game room, laundry and well stocked C-Store. Theres also a small CASINO inside. Restrooms were very clean and stocked..recommend this pit stop to anyone passing thru!

A conveniently located convenience store next to a restaurant and associated with a fuel station that had reasonably priced fuel.  The bathrooms were clean and had a lot of stalls.  There was a wide variety of beverages (alcohol and non alcoholic)  tons of snack options including doughnuts. There was also abundant souvenirs.

This place is disgusting since Circle K took over from Holiday.
The floor is dirty and the men's room is just plain nasty. It about makes you puke it stinks so bad. It used to be a nice clean stop.
I don't typically stop at these places but, needed to for a restrooms break, was pretty clean & stocked

showerReviews.reviewText: Friendly people inside and shower was ok. Big lot for parking. Was here on a Sunday and told they were not cooking any burgers or anything else and told about their cold options instead

locations.title: 1 Stop Travel Plaza
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a decent Love‚Äôs clean parking lot, clean store, restrooms and showers. The only issue I had is when I went in to shower this morning at like 4 o‚Äôclock you have an employee. I did not catch his name, but he‚Äôs a rather large man and ‚Ä¶

I wanted to make a request to change how this loves is set up so truckers don't have to walk a quarter mile to shower and eat. Can we instead make the people who don't work as much as us, or drive vehicles as big as us walk instead. Check ‚Ä¶
Clean shower lots of parking and they have the washers and dryers that uses the MLR card so no need for coins.

Absolutely amazing experience in terms of long distance travelling through America. Shower facilities were clean and amazing to use after a long hike in the Black Hills. Staff was very friendly and helpful in every way. Can't thank you guys ‚Ä¶

Very long wait for shower i already waiting last 40 minutes tgat time only i am the person waiting i saw 4-5 Coustmer leave shower and 3-4 employees just walk here but nobody clean shower now 7 shower waiting they have total 7 shower but ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , and it's what it needs to be - a very restful and convenient place. The shower is first rate, the sites are spotless concrete pads, back-in, with FHU. Cellular service is fast - both Verizon and T-Mobile. Shopping is nearby,, road ‚Ä¶

Good place for fuel, shower and sleep BUT grain to coup coffee machine n√©es a maintenance : 6 minutes to brew an awful taste coffee doesn't worth the wait and the price. Filter coffee machines were both empty : housse and columbian.

This location is understaffed.  The bathrooms were atrocious upon arrival and things weren't cleaned even an hour later. Also, truck side employees don't show till 7:00a so good luck getting a shower till then.

‚Ä¶ that's what keeps me coming back, no matter where in America I am.  Thank u so much for everything u do, thank u for always having a clean store, bathroom, AND shower.  And even tho I'm always incognito üòÇüòÇ y'all still greet me with a smile ‚Ä¶
Stopped for a couple of hours, took a shower. ‚Ä¶
What used to be $5 for a shower is now $15. Please explain why your price went up 200% in a month. Kind of a ripoff is you ask me.
Decent little place to stop for truckers 1 shower, plenty of drink options, decent food and nice ppl.
No shower's, 6pm no hot food , a glorified convenience store with diesel and parking....just sad not a real truck stop. PS friendly staff.
Very clean shower.

‚Ä¶ morning of working on the semi. Cold, wet and disgusting. Grabbed a shower and headed over to the restaurant for what I hoped was a good burger and fries. Shower and lounge area was very musty and outdated. Came in to the restaurant at 12: ‚Ä¶

Good place be nice if its was bigger. But showers you have to be a very small man or woman to shower in there. No toilet so use it before you shower. The  lady on inside was very nice and helpful. But could stand a good clean on the inside ‚Ä¶

Around 30 truck parking spots (if drivers would learn how to park and care for others too). Awesome country side place to stop at if you need a break, delicious restaurant food, $5.38 shower, nice driver lounge, laundry, etc.
Really nice people and you cant beat and $8 shower.
Good food helpful workers clean shower's they are a little small but clean

showerReviews.reviewText: Staff were ok,  the worst part the stupid music so loud, the first time I came it was hard to understand the cashier , the second time I came music loud and the shower monitor was very loud by the entrance with different music

showerReviews.reviewText: This TA travel station has it all. We were able to use the RV dump station for $5, get a nice hot shower in a good clean facility for $17, do our laundry in clean laundry machines for a total of $8 (plus we had to buy the laundry soap, ‚Ä¶

The fuel pumps don‚Äôt work so you have to go inside. They don‚Äôt give you the rewards points/shower credits that you earn. The towels are nasty‚Ä¶.. you‚Äôre better off going anywhere else if possible.

This was a great all-in-one stop. nice private unlimited showers. Locking room with toilet and sink as well. Had good hot water. They provided 2 towels, 2 wash clothes, and 1 hand towel. Even a bar of soap. Shower for $15.95. I did 2 loads ‚Ä¶

Very complete store.
You can take a shower and do your laundry.
Very clean.
One of the best places i have been to for shower and laundry.  The water is silky soft.
Great shower's

Attention, truckers!!! First of all, it's not a regular "Flying J Travel Plaza". They do not accept truck driver's rewards points for the shower. Even if you get  the 50 gallons of diesel, you can't get a free shower. Second, I washed my ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ you are a O.T.R. Truck Driver, you will like this place. Easy in and out refueling, lot's of parking, clean shower room's and latrines. Let's not forget a fantastic dinner, and a bar/casino that is top notch. The casino is just video ‚Ä¶
No longer a flying j... 12.06 for a shower, might as well stay in Rapid or Hot Springs.

$8 spotless shower.Thank u
Stopped for a shower, very clean and reasonably priced. Restroom was also very clean. Friendly employees. So glad we found this Travel stop.

‚Ä¶ Not too polite, but the young girl with red hair was polite, friendly and others were good too. Bathrooms and all areas were clean. The upstairs dedicated for trackers looks good and clean - shower rooms, bathrooms, washer&dryer, tables. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ so low. We pulled in after 9pm (30-foot RV) and there was ample parking that wasn't next to truck so we were well out of their way. The shower ($7) was clean, warm with good pressure. The coffee was great in the morning. Would totally stop ‚Ä¶

Western Travel Terminal is a great place to fill up on fuel, on snacks, coffee, to grab a bite to eat, get a clean shower, or drink suds & cocktails. The waitstaff is really friendly & the food tasty. You'd be hard put to find a better ‚Ä¶

Thank you Jonathon for opening up the shower so I could bath my puppy dog! Also man great job in there, no dust on fan floors clean toilet shining..they should promote u buddy! Left a 5 bill at desk for uüöõ you are awesome sir ‚Ä¶

Truck driver here. Stopped here to shower and get lunch. The following day I came down with the Norovirus which was so intense it sent me to the hospital that night. My doctor theorized that because I used the public showers here at this ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ City because of the reputation for water in fuel at the Flying J location on the East side of the city but no problems here. There was even parking at 0515 on a Sunday and a clean shower and nice staff.  The tall blonde lady was cheery :-) ‚Ä¶

My husband ran an ultra marathon of 107 miles in the black hills. After the race, we needed showers and our campsite did not have them. We googled it and Pilot Travel Center showed up and we gave it a shot. I am so beyond pleased with our ‚Ä¶
Setting for shower hours where no damn cleaning person to do the job

Shower is super clean‚Ä¶. This comment is specifically for staff .. guys you are so polite‚Ä¶ specially at subway lady super friendly‚Ä¶ don‚Äôt even hesitate to put anything I ask extra topic ‚Ä¶ wow thank you so much..

We came all the way from the eastern panhandle of WV. Had been on the road, no sleep except for 2 or 3 hours, and no shower for 2 and a half days!! Shayla was sweet. I work at the Pilot in ClearBrook,VA and felt an instant connection with ‚Ä¶
$18.05 for a shower ... There's not much on food üòï... but nice little quiet parking area ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ in for diesel with a 40 ft 5th wheel. Was easy in and out. Also took a quick shower at $12 was a bit pricey. I think $12 is too much but it was very clean, extremely hot, and spacious. In addition to the normal convenience items the had the ‚Ä¶

Couple of months ago, I was in a hurry and needed a shower and to change clothes. Brett the assistant manager helped me get in and out quickly. He was incredibly helpful and pleasant. The showers were very clean and nice.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We are always grateful to use the Loves RV spots while traveling,  however,  with no water and $60/ night,  having to pay $10 for a shower (though super clean) is insulting. The 2nd shower is your traveling with a spouse is full price. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ had a family restroom and they did not. But told us to stop and they would figure something out. So we did and they opened up a shower for me to take my mother in to use the bathroom! The staff was amazing and the bathroom was immaculate!

‚Ä¶ and fruits. A Godfathers pizza place too and standard rollers if you wish. The best thing was the new showers. They are spacious and have air hand dryers, the fan of course but the best thing of all is excellent water pressure!! Lots of hot ‚Ä¶
Stopped for a 10hr and grabbed a shower the shower was super clean. They left a little candy as a treat and the staff was friendly and polite will definitely stop again.

Chelsea was amazing she was super fast getting the shower cleaned and ready for the next person. It was really clean. Very clean and she was very polite and happy. Very good customer service. Highly recommend this place for a nice clean ‚Ä¶
This stop is amazing. It had a dog park, great food options and the bathroom/shower facilities were clean and safe. Amazing!

If I was rating on the showers alone, I would only rate 3 stars.  If I was rating on the store/truck stop only, I would give 5 stars. The showers themselves are nice and big and modern, but Love‚Äôs seemed to be short staffed and the shower I ‚Ä¶
Stopped in for a quick shower. Pizza smelt so good couldn't resist.  We enjoyed our large all meat. It was outstanding. Plus $2 off in the app. üòÅüòÅüòÅ From KY. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to stay (when not in the woods). This was the cleanest and most friendly Love‚Äôs I‚Äôve been to. The shower was spotless as was the rest of the place. I highly recommend and look forward to passing through and stopping at this location again!

4 Showers available, but you are unable to take a shower cause Manager Kate and another employee decided they do not want to clear showers‚Ä¶
Hard workers in USA are long gone.
The person who cleans the shower asked me ,on my way out,Did I leave a tip for him. Is this mandatory now,especially on Pilot truck stops?
Shower was great except they only give 1 wash cloth and 1 towel. ‚Ä¶

Employees overnight said laundry was down so couldn't shower. I said I have my own towels, don't need theirs. They proceeded to claim there was no way to clean the showers afterwards. Maybe I'm unfamiliar with the procedure, for now 1 star ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ in the mountains of Montana. Finally run out of my 11 hours here in Murdo with 10 min to spare. Hungry and in need of a quick shower I go in, I‚Äôm sorry showers are closed! What why, the guy went home already. There‚Äôs 3 of you here! I ‚Ä¶

They shut showers down because they ‚Äúdon‚Äôt feel like cleaning them‚Äù. I then was threatened with having the sheriffs dept called on me for an item I had a receipt for when I asked for my shower credit back. UNBELIEVABLE.

‚Ä¶ Not too polite, but the young girl with red hair was polite, friendly and others were good too. Bathrooms and all areas were clean. The upstairs dedicated for trackers looks good and clean - shower rooms, bathrooms, washer&dryer, tables. ‚Ä¶

Wonderful experience! Stopped here while trucking with my husband. Bathroom/shower was immaculate!! Clean, spacious, upkept!! & food selection is broad for quick on the go meals. Loved the mini burritos & mini tacos. Wish I would‚Äôve said ‚Ä¶

I used to like stopping in at coffee cup truck stops but lately I've only had bad experiences.   Last few times I wanted a shower they had no hot water.  Today they also had no hot food and it a only 8:30 pm.  With it being -3 F out side in ‚Ä¶

Purchased $545 in fuel and the cashier gave me a card to present when I wanted to shower, but when doing so they made me pay. Terrible and the cashier didn't care at all. Then shower was filthy and no shower mat. Will never go rhere again.
Very good. They have 2 showers ($10 for shower). Plenty of parking spots, hot drinks, and food are available.
Friendly people inside and shower was ok. Big lot for parking. Was here on a Sunday and told they were not cooking any burgers or anything else and told about their cold options instead

‚Ä¶ We are always grateful to use the Loves RV spots while traveling,  however,  with no water and $60/ night,  having to pay $10 for a shower (though super clean) is insulting. The 2nd shower is your traveling with a spouse is full price. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ had a family restroom and they did not. But told us to stop and they would figure something out. So we did and they opened up a shower for me to take my mother in to use the bathroom! The staff was amazing and the bathroom was immaculate!

‚Ä¶ and fruits. A Godfathers pizza place too and standard rollers if you wish. The best thing was the new showers. They are spacious and have air hand dryers, the fan of course but the best thing of all is excellent water pressure!! Lots of hot ‚Ä¶
Stopped for a 10hr and grabbed a shower the shower was super clean. They left a little candy as a treat and the staff was friendly and polite will definitely stop again.

Chelsea was amazing she was super fast getting the shower cleaned and ready for the next person. It was really clean. Very clean and she was very polite and happy. Very good customer service. Highly recommend this place for a nice clean ‚Ä¶
This stop is amazing. It had a dog park, great food options and the bathroom/shower facilities were clean and safe. Amazing!

If I was rating on the showers alone, I would only rate 3 stars.  If I was rating on the store/truck stop only, I would give 5 stars. The showers themselves are nice and big and modern, but Love‚Äôs seemed to be short staffed and the shower I ‚Ä¶
Stopped in for a quick shower. Pizza smelt so good couldn't resist.  We enjoyed our large all meat. It was outstanding. Plus $2 off in the app. üòÅüòÅüòÅ From KY. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to stay (when not in the woods). This was the cleanest and most friendly Love‚Äôs I‚Äôve been to. The shower was spotless as was the rest of the place. I highly recommend and look forward to passing through and stopping at this location again!

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ morning of working on the semi. Cold, wet and disgusting. Grabbed a shower and headed over to the restaurant for what I hoped was a good burger and fries. Shower and lounge area was very musty and outdated. Came in to the restaurant at 12: ‚Ä¶

Good place be nice if its was bigger. But showers you have to be a very small man or woman to shower in there. No toilet so use it before you shower. The  lady on inside was very nice and helpful. But could stand a good clean on the inside ‚Ä¶

Around 30 truck parking spots (if drivers would learn how to park and care for others too). Awesome country side place to stop at if you need a break, delicious restaurant food, $5.38 shower, nice driver lounge, laundry, etc.
Really nice people and you cant beat and $8 shower.
Good food helpful workers clean shower's they are a little small but clean

showerReviews.reviewText: Friendly staff, however both sets of bathrooms were just absolutely destroyed one was overflowing and one was covered in puke. ‚Ä¶
Good easy parking,  good food fairly priced, clean showers and staff was super friendly! Pretty quiet at night so was a good stop
I was here on (12/12). Good place to stop and get cheap diesel through mudflap, and after fueling, you get a free shower, and customer service is good also.

Cleanest gas station I‚Äôve been in a good amount of time always great greetings when you walk in Kyle and Logan are the best always helping fueling and friendly as you can‚Äôt get A1 service üëçüèªü§ôüèª ‚Ä¶
Showers are cheap and thr staff is super friendly

I purchased fuel, then got a shower. The bartender lady was in the store and made a rude and sarcastic comment when I asked if I could lock my belongings in the shower room while I went to use the toilet. After my shower I went to the ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: What used to be $5 for a shower is now $15. Please explain why your price went up 200% in a month. Kind of a ripoff is you ask me.
Decent little place to stop for truckers 1 shower, plenty of drink options, decent food and nice ppl.
No shower's, 6pm no hot food , a glorified convenience store with diesel and parking....just sad not a real truck stop. PS friendly staff.
Very clean shower.
